Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Central Park
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Central Park due to debris near the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Central Park due to debris near the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes such as the #21 Cermak bus, or using buses to other rail lines. Shuttle buses requested between 54th/Cermak and Central Park to provide connecting service. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
